mapper.insert: insert into users(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONENUM, REGID, IMG) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNum}, #{regId}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONENUM, ENABLED, REGID, IMG FROM users WHERE email= #{email}
select EMAIL, NAME, PHONENUM, REGID, IMG from users where email <> #{email}
select b.authority from users a inner join user_roles b on a.email = b.email and a.email = #{email}
